item.description:
Here's a chance to see the Escher exhibit before it leaves Boston. You'll recognize some of these prints and at the same time be awed by the creativity of this talented mind.

Fall up the stairs into mind-bending worlds at a new exhibit of high-quality Escher reprints. Just ten percent larger than Escher's jewel-like originals, these reproductions maintain the impact of Escher's carefully drafted alternative worlds while allowing visitors to examine them in greater detail.


TICKET NOTE
To avoid the higher museum entrance fee, go to your public library and order your $5 pass. I believe you need to call your library 3 days before the October 23rd meetup date.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: M.C. Escher Exhibit - Museum of Science
